name: In re Objection to Nominating Petitions or Nominating Party of Joseph PRESTON, Jr. Appeal of Joe JACKSON
name_abbreviation: In re Objection to Nominating Petitions or Nominating Party of Preston

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: In re Objection to Nominating Petitions or Nominating Party of Joseph PRESTON, Jr. Appeal of Joe JACKSON.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of May, 1998, the order of the Commonwealth Court of Pennsylvania is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Angelo A. Papa, New Castle, for Joe Jackson.
John Connelly, for Joseph Preston, Jr.
Dick Filling, Commissioner, for Bureau of Elections.
casebody.head_matter:
709 A.2d 904
In re Objection to Nominating Petitions or Nominating Party of Joseph PRESTON, Jr. Appeal of Joe JACKSON.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 12, 1998.
Decided May 18, 1998.
Angelo A. Papa, New Castle, for Joe Jackson.
John Connelly, for Joseph Preston, Jr.
Dick Filling, Commissioner, for Bureau of Elections.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
